title: Bonus: "The Right Way to Take Time Off" From Founder's Journal
description:
Special bonus ep from our sister show Founder's Journal!
In this episode, Morning Brew Co-Founder Alex Lieberman discusses the steps you should take to properly set yourself up at work before taking time off.
As mentioned in the episode, check out two of my previous episodes, How to Unplug From Work and How To Get Your Shit Together, for more helpful tools related to PTO.
And you can find even more episodes of Founder's Journal on your favorite podcast platform here: https://link.chtbl.com/founders-journal
Full transcripts for all Founder's Journal episodes available at https://foundersjournal.morningbrew.com
itunes:author: Morning Brew
itunes:subtitle: Morning Brew Co-Founder Alex Lieberman goes through the steps to properly take time off.

Special bonus ep from our sister show Founder's Journal!

In this episode, Morning Brew Co-Founder Alex Lieberman discusses the steps you should take to properly set yourself up at work before taking time off.

As mentioned in the episode, check out two of my previous episodes, How to Unplug From Work and How To Get Your Shit Together, for more helpful tools related to PTO.

And you can find even more episodes of Founder's Journal on your favorite podcast platform here: https://link.chtbl.com/founders-journal
